entry.data:
WIDESPREAD FROST THIS MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH IN THE MORNING

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
